text: Distancing myself from everyone  Including family Now that I ve collected my thoughts and feelings   I have something to say   Tonight one of my bros came home shit faced  Got into a huge fight with my parents and then my older brother  whose cabin we re currently at  My older bro then came out after hearing it and they go at it The joys of alcohol  But I can t blame my bro because I too have indulged in alcohol because of my own problems   And now I will do so again because of this whole incident I wouldn t be lying if I said I feel like I m  done  with living  There may be this tiny fraction or part of me that clings on ever so lightly to hope  but it ll break at the thought of anymore problems   It s almost like my spirit of life has been broken  Or my effort to even try anymore  I feel like I may become mute  Never speak unless spoken to  Never interact with anyone unless I absolutely have to  I just feel like I m a particle floating around in blackness   People say life has its ups and downs but I just feel like I m this grey  old  disoriented figure walking among the bright beauty of what people call  life   I don t want any pity  Just needed to let that out  I don t know what the future holds  but yeah

text: RantThere was a post circulating about a dad cradling his daughter after a suicide attempt  The replies were to be expected but it still infuriated me to read  People think they are just so fucking helpful or feel they have some fucking higher knowledge about suicide that no one else has ever thought of   Think of your family  or  Don t be selfish  It s fucking exhausting listening to people reiterate elementary mental health advice from Sesame Street  Of course it will effect your family but don t you realize by the time the person buys the rope  they are way past thinking about that  I know this is rant but I m just so tired  I m tired of trying to live my life the same while I m crumbling under the weight of my mental health from all the years before  My family is useless and prayer isn t going  Religion isn t something that has helped  actually has done the opposite  I hate knowing that I will live is degenerate sexual lifestyle that will send me to Hell if I ever act on it  I am very lonely person and feel so untouchable  No one has ever wanted me to be there  My family are the only one that are around me yet I am trying to distance myself from them  The only reason I don t go is for my family  unfortunately enough  I would also feel terrible knowing how many people want to live or be in my place  It s a terrible struggle so I just hate it when people bring it up like it s a piece of new knowledge  This is all over the place but I fear for my time on this Earth  I wish I was born normal so I wouldn t have to go through being inferior  I wish I was normal so I could just blindly believe in something greater like the rest of my family  My family cannot help me and I have no one  I am disgusted by myself
summary: There was a post circulating about a dad cradling his daughter after a suicide attempt. It infuriated him to read people's replies. He suffers from mental health issues. He doesn't want to live his life the same way because he's lonely and depressed.

text: I ll never be a normal personAll my life  I ve had a hard time relating to people  It s not that I was a loner  or didn t enjoy talking to them  The contrary   I consider myself extroverted  I enjoy talking to people  I even enjoy public speaking  I just can t make friends  It s not that I act in an off putting way  I dress normally  shower  talk to people  and do all of these other things human beings are supposed to  People don t instantly reject me  I just don t form bonds to them with months of contact  while normal people do in hours A while ago  I spoke to a psychiatrist about this  as well as depression  She thought it sounded like I have  high functioning  autism  She conceded that this was unsolvable  but that I should strive to resolve things  since being unemployed is bad  and  also  won t pay her bills Now  I know what the stock response to this is  autism is a part of your personality  if you cured it you wouldn t be you anymore  embrace the weirdness  But here s the thing  I don t want to be weird  I don t want to be a freak  I don t want to live in a group home  I want to be able to hold a drivers license without perjuring myself  All I ve ever wanted in my life is to be a normal person  Imagine an accountant with   children in a stable  loving  monogamous  heterosexual marriage  that s the sort of life style I m going for In light of what I ve understood  it seems like I ll never be able to accomplish that  Normal human relationships will simply be forever off limits for me  There ll always be the disclaimer  like the ballcap   Please be patient  I have autism  Put bluntly  I ll always be the outsider   It s commonly said that there s no cure for autism  but this is  in fact  not true  It s just a matter of what side effects you re willing to put up with  In this case  sadly  it seems like anything is better than the status quo
summary: Autistic man wants to be a normal person. He has a hard time relating to people. He doesn't form bonds with people with months of contact as normal people do in hours. He is unemployed and can't pay his bills.
cleaned: autistic man want normal person hard time relate people not form bond people month contact normal people hour unemployed not pay bill

summary: Aussie has been studying a Diploma in ICT Networking since February this year. He's in debt due to student loans, his fast food job doesn't give him shifts anymore, he was recently diagnosed with Dysthymia and Asperger's Syndrome, and he has next to zero work experience.

text: Every moment is a bruh momentI really have nothing going for me  I was just shy of gifted as a kid but I m not at all smart  I don t particularly excel in anything  I can t draw  make music  heck I can t even play Minecraft without being scared or dying  I always play on Peaceful  I barely even beat the Ender Dragon It s time to go to college now and I don t want to do it  My parents want my to be the  first on both sides  to go and finish higher education but I genuinely have no idea what I want to major in  I never thought I d make it passed   and I don t want to be stuck in a miserable cycle for the rest of my life I don t have friends anymore  yet I crave human interaction  I used to be so out there and social  But I ve never been able to hold good friends  I really want to end it all but I m so scared of what s after and if I ll be eternally punished  I want to die but I also want to experience all of the happy feelings I have once in a blue moon I m stuck in limbo and I don t know how to get out

text: I don t deserveI don t deserve to kill myself  I ve never experienced rape  murder  physical violence  Hell even my cousin which got kidnapped and almost beaten and cut to death and peed on  made clean up after them  for hours  even he isn t suicidal  I m not terribly poor  I m pretty well off  Although I have a cold and unlovable family  it could be worse  My dad could be a child molester  my mom could have been physically abusive   I have it pretty good  well good might be an exaggeration  but I have it better than most  So why am I so unhappy  why can t I feel anything at times or too much sometime  I would be better off dead  I don t do anything  do I have aspirations  Yes  do I do anything about it  No  I hate people  can t stand them most if the time  I can t work  I d rather rot on the street  I m good for absolutely nothing  I m only good at feeling sorry for myself  Do I want to kill myself  Kind off  I m not sure  Maybe it s just the easy way out  I know at least a handful might miss me  But would they even care   month after  Will I have made enough of an impact on their life  Who knows  I really want to die  I really want to die  But I feel like I shouldn t but will I ever be able to do  anything This is really  ranty  but I m not sure what to feel  Do I even want to get better and face real life  I m not sure I ll ever be capable  Maybe if I could live on welfare for the rest of my life I might be able to at least live and maybe pick up motivation on the way Well for at least now my life seems hopeless and maybe sooner or later death will come knocking on my door if I don t get better  soon  I just hope my life doesn t end here  and maybe one day I ll know how it feels to smile

text: I m trying to cope with my depression but I m literally all alone I can t keep my house clean  I have no energy to get out of bed each morning  I work   hour weeks  so that I can have the extra money for my pets and partner   I ve been trying to improve myself by setting small daily goals  Making my bed one day  Doing the dishes the next  literally the most overwhelming task for me somehow But he keeps belittling me   You literally do nothing every day  he says  He tells me I don t work out enough  he has a strict workout routine  I tried to explain to him that I have no energy and it s difficult for me to find the motivation to workout after working a   hour day  I told him that maybe he can help motivate me to workout by suggesting joint activities That s not my job  You say you hate your body  that should be motivation enough Okay  well I m really really tired  and he doesn t let me hang out with anyone else so it s not like I can turn to anyone else for motivation  I also have severe ADHD  so I have a hard time remembering tasks or sometimes feel too overwhelmed to complete them  He turns everything into a personal attack   I asked you to go buy eggs yesterday and you didn t go out at all  You obviously don t find me important and want me to starve Okay  I m sorry  I ll go get them now  Then he screams at me for not making them for him  and says that we have nothing to eat even though we do have food  it s just not food he wants I m really really tired  All the time  I m not trying to make my mental illnesses into an excuse  but I wish that he at least acknowledged them because I m dealing with it all on my own and I m at an all time low  I really really really want to end it  but I m worried that he won t care for my cats and dog when I pass  I don t have a single moment of security or contentment   I ve never felt this lonely before
summary: Lonely and depressed, she works an hour a day for extra money for her pets and partner. Her partner belittles her for not working out enough. She has severe ADHD and has a hard time remembering tasks. She is worried that he won't care for her cats and dog when she dies.
cleaned: lonely depressed work hour day extra money pet partner partner belittle not work severe add hard time remember task worried not care cat dog die
